definition: to remind/to call attention to/to warn of
to carry (hanging down from the hand)/to lift/to put forward/to mention/to raise (an issue)/upwards character stroke/lifting brush stroke (in painting)/scoop for measuring liquid
to wake up/to be awake/to become aware/to sober up/to come to
reminder

sentences.english: Once more, Cinderella's fairy godmother reminded her to be home by midnight.
sentences.chinese: 仙女教母再一次提醒辛德瑞拉要在午夜前到家。

sentences.english: Dreyman: I specifically said no books.
sentences.chinese: 特定的我提醒过不要书。

sentences.english: He reminded me how careful I ought to be in doing it.
sentences.chinese: 他提醒我在做这事的时候应如何小心。

sentences.english: Remind FeiEr exhibition peng, to pay more attention to their image.
sentences.chinese: 展鹏提醒非儿今非昔比，要多注意自己的形象。

sentences.english: The point is that it alerts you to something that is being withheld.
sentences.chinese: 重要的是，这个手势提醒了你事有隐情。

sentences.english: I send this Valen tine’s card to remind you that I love you.
sentences.chinese: 我送上这张卡片，为的是要提醒你，我爱你。

sentences.english: In caseI forget, please remind me about it.
In order to improve her English , she wants to make friends with a high school student in your country .
sentences.chinese: 提醒我还需要不断学习和提高，不能坐井观天。

sentences.english: This proactive alert enables you to accelerate the recovery from downtimes.
sentences.chinese: 这种积极主动的提醒，您可以加快恢复停工。

sentences.english: Of course I remember. Need you remind me?
sentences.chinese: 我当然记得了。你有必要提醒我吗？

sentences.english: And remind yourself that parents are people too.
sentences.chinese: 提醒自己父母也是平常人。

sentences.english: But we must remind our comrades that they must truly follow the spirit of the "May 7th Directive".
sentences.chinese: 但要提醒同志们注意，必须真正执行五七指示的精神。

sentences.english: It's constant reminder, twice a week.
sentences.chinese: 经常性的提醒，一周两次。

sentences.english: Conscience warns us as a friend before it punishes us as a judge.
sentences.chinese: 良心如同法曹施行惩罚之前，已如良友一般先行提醒。

sentences.english: We remind clinician that it must be cautious when they applicate hormone replacement therapy.
sentences.chinese: 提醒临床医生应慎用激素替代疗法。

sentences.english: She then reminded me of something which happened a few months ago.
sentences.chinese: 然后她提醒我几个月前发生的一件事。

definition: to point out/to remind (sb of sth)/to suggest/suggestion/tip/reminder/notice
to take note of/to pay attention to
to warn/to admonish
to be mindful/to pay attention to/to take note of
to warn/to alert/warning/cautionary
to warn repeatedly/to urge/to exhort again and again
to be careful/to take care
to warn/to admonish
to remember with reverence/to bear in mind/to keep in mind
Please note:/tip/hint
to be on the alert/vigilant/alert/on guard/to warn
to inform
to be on guard/wariness/to guard against/preventive
to be careful/to pay attention to
to guard against/to beware of
remember at all costs
